taxon.author: Framenau & Castanheira, 2021
taxon.distribution: Australia (Western Australia, Northern Territory, Queensland, South Australia)

referenceObject.reference: Framenau, V. W., Baptista, R. L. C., Oliveira, F. S. M. & Castanheira, P. de S. (2021b). Taxonomic revision of the new spider genus Hortophora, the Australasian garden orb-weavers (Araneae, Araneidae). Evolutionary Systematics 5(2): 275-334.
